segments.source_content:
---
slug: records-and-tuples-for-react
title: Records & Tuples for React
description: .Records & Tuples for React... and how they are much more than immutable data structures.
authors: [slorber]
twitterThreadUrl: "https://slo.im/thread"
image: ./images/hero.png
---

**Records & Tuples**, a very interesting **[proposal](https://github.com/tc39/proposal-record-tuple)**, has just reached **[stage 2](https://twitter.com/robpalmer2/status/1286040041089904640)** at **TC39**.

translations.zh-hant: **紀錄與元組**（Records & Tuples），一個非常有趣的**[提案](https://github.com/tc39/proposal-record-tuple)**，剛剛在 **TC39** 達到了**[第二階段](https://twitter.com/robpalmer2/status/1286040041089904640)**。

segments.source_content: They bring **deeply immutable data structures** to JavaScript.

translations.zh-hant: 它們為 JavaScript 帶來了**深度不可變的資料結構**。

segments.source_content: But don't overlook their **equality properties**, that are <u>**VERY**</u> interesting for **React**.

zh-hant.translation: 但不要忽略它們的**等值特性**，這對於 **React** 來說<u>**非常**</u>有趣。
zh-hant.reason: Content of a non-translatable 'mdxJsxTextElement' element was changed. Source: '<u>**VERY**</u>', Translation: '<u>**非常**</u>'.

segments.source_content: A whole category of **React bugs** are related to **unstable object identities**:

translations.zh-hant: 一整類的 **React 錯誤**都與**不穩定的物件識別**有關：

segments.source_content:
- **Performance**: re-renders that could be avoided
- **Behavior**: useless effect re-executions, infinite loops
- **API surface**: unability to express when a stable object identity matters

translations.zh-hant:
- **效能**：可以避免的重新渲染
- **行為**：無效的副作用重新執行、無限迴圈
- **API 介面**：無法表達何時需要穩定的物件識別

segments.source_content: I will explain the basics of **Records & Tuples**, and how they can solve **real world React issues**.

translations.zh-hant: 我將解釋 **Records & Tuples** 的基礎，以及它們如何解決**現實世界中的 React 問題**。
